errors.error_description: The hyperlink for the license badge points to a non-existent 'LICENSE' file instead of 'LICENSE.md'.
The README specifies an outdated and incompatible Python version requirement (Python 2.7).
correction_candidates: This tool is written in Python and requires Python 3.6+ to run.
This tool is written in Python and requires Python 3.0 or later to run.
This tool is written in Python and requires both Python 2.7+ and Python 3+ to run.
This tool is written in Python and is compatible with all Python versions.
errors.golden_answer: This tool is written in Python and requires Python 3.6+ to run.
